perturbation.changed_text: "Territory" means the GCC States, excluding Bahrain for Direct Access/EAP purposes.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction in the definition of 'Territory.' Initially, it unambiguously included all GCC states. The modification excludes Bahrain for Direct Access/EAP, potentially creating confusion regarding SCIEN's rights and obligations in Bahrain under different sections of the agreement. This ambiguity can lead to disputes over market access and sales territories.

perturbation.original_text: SCIEN shall pay HEMISPHERX for each order of Product within 75 days after receipt of the goods except for the for first purchase order which will be for 50 vials of Interferon alfa-n3 (human leukocyte derived) ("First Order") and paid once the MOH approves the use for Interferon alfa-n3 (human leukocyte derived) on 5 MERS patients. All purchase orders are final.
perturbation.changed_text: SCIEN shall pay HEMISPHERX for each order of Product within 75 days after receipt of the goods except for the for first purchase order which will be for 50 vials of Interferon alfa-n3 (human leukocyte derived) ("First Order") and paid within 30 days of receipt. All subsequent purchase orders are subject to MOH approval for Interferon alfa-n3 (human leukocyte derived) on 5 MERS patients before payment. All purchase orders are final.
perturbation.explanation: The conflicting text now states that the first order should be paid within 30 days of receipt, contradicting the initial condition of payment upon MOH approval. This internal inconsistency creates confusion regarding the payment terms for the first order and introduces new conditions for subsequent purchases that were not initially stated. It is unclear when the subsequent order can be paid to HEMISPHERX.

perturbation.original_text:
A. SCIEN and HEMISPHERX agree to keep secret and confidential all confidential, proprietary or non-public information ("Confidential Information") of the other Party .This provision shall survive termination or expiration of this Agreement.

B. Such Confidential Information will be kept confidential until 5 years after the expiration of termination of this Agreement. Notwithstanding the foregoing , Confidential Information of a Party shall not include information which the other Party can establish by written documentation was (a) to have been publicly known prior to disclosure of such information by the disclosing Party to the other Party, (b) to have become publicly known, without fault on the part of the other Party, subsequent to disclosure of such information by the disclosing Party to the other Party, (c) to have been received by the other Party at any time from a source , other than the disclosing Party, rightfully having possession of and the right to disclose such information, (d) to have been otherwise known by the other Party prior to disclosure of such information by the disclosing Party to the other Party, or (e) to have been independently developed by employees or agents of the other Party without access to or use of such information disclosed by the disclosing Party to the other Party.
perturbation.changed_text:
A. SCIEN and HEMISPHERX agree to keep secret and confidential all confidential, proprietary or non-public information ("Confidential Information") of the other Party .This provision shall survive termination or expiration of this Agreement.

B. Such Confidential Information will be kept confidential until 2 years after the expiration of termination of this Agreement. Notwithstanding the foregoing , Confidential Information of a Party shall not include information which the other Party can establish by written documentation was (a) to have been publicly known prior to disclosure of such information by the disclosing Party to the other Party, (b) to have become publicly known, without fault on the part of the other Party, subsequent to disclosure of such information by the disclosing Party to the other Party, (c) to have been received by the other Party at any time from a source , other than the disclosing Party, rightfully having possession of and the right to disclose such information, (d) to have been otherwise known by the other Party prior to disclosure of such information by the disclosing Party to the other Party, or (e) to have been independently developed by employees or agents of the other Party without access to or use of such information disclosed by the disclosing Party to the other Party.
perturbation.explanation: By changing the term limit from 5 to 2 years, there is now confusion on what amount of time is the actual Confidentiality term. This introduces internal contradiction and allows the party to get away with sharing confidential information earlier.
